title: Vega Echo Audio Ear Pad for Motorcycle Helmet - Pair (Black)
features: Block the wind, sun and extend your half helmet riding season
Comes standard with 1 year manufacturer defect warranty on parts and workmanship
description: Vega Echo's audio ear pads not only extend your riding season but are a great addition to any half helmet. They have audio pockets that will fit most speakers and are made from a soft fleece. With the universal hook/loop design these will fit in most brands of half helmets. They will not only keep your ears warm but also block the wind and the sun.
